name: Destroy Comet Guardian DEMO
description:
Destroy Comet Guardian (DEMO)

This demo version is played until the boss has been defeated.

Destroy Comet Guardian is a harcore 2d action game with guns, monsters and bosses. 

Game features:

  • Everything takes place on the same screen
  • You go off taking down the first enemy and continue until you defeat the final boss, no saving
  • Monsters become stronger and more dangerous while they are alive
  • The less ammo you have, the more powerfull your weapons become

What I plan to do next:

  • Add more monsters, weapons and bosses
  • Add weapon upgrades
  • Add other game meachanics that enhances the gameplay
  • Make better interfaces and polish the game

Music used is free by Hatebit:

SHIDA,  Sursum corda, eR-tone
